description:
Household energy storage system Sunwoda Atrix Basic-5 (51.2v 5.12kWh) is a green, efficient, advanced, and safe energy supply system that can reduce your electricity bill by storing excess clean energy generated by the solar panel, or energy from the grid during off-peak hours. It is mainly used for residential self-generation, peak shaving and valley filling, emergency power backup, and power optimization in residential and commercial buildings. The Atrix series can be expanded from 5kWh to 40kWh, allowing homeowners to build their own energy storage system flexibly.

Sunwoda Atrix Basic-5 (51.2v 5.12kWh) Description

Flexible application

  • Modular and cabinet installation

Easy to install

  • With a modular, lightweight, and plug-and-play design, the Atrix series only takes 1-2 people to install

Excellent Performance at Low Temperature

  • The Atrix series can be 100% DOD and can operate at -10℃ without any limitation or attenuation

Real-Time Monitoring

  • Homeowners can control and monitor their Atrix series via APP anytime and anywhere

The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, is a powerful and efficient solution for residential and commercial solar power systems. Thanks to its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter maximizes energy utilization, thereby promoting cost savings and reducing reliance on the grid.
description:
Deye 30kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU)

The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, is a powerful and efficient solution for residential and commercial solar power systems. Thanks to its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter maximizes energy utilization, thereby promoting cost savings and reducing reliance on the grid.

Introduction

Solar power is increasingly popular as a clean, sustainable energy source. To maximize its potential, an efficient inverter is essential. The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter is an excellent choice for residential and commercial installations, thanks to its advanced features and superior performance. This article explores the Deye 30kW’s key features, benefits, installation process, performance, safety, maintenance, and integration with solar power systems.

Understanding Hybrid Inverters

Before we dive into the specifics, it’s important to briefly understand what hybrid inverters are. In essence, hybrid inverters are sophisticated devices that combine the functionality of a grid-tied inverter and a battery inverter. They allow seamless switching between grid power, solar power, and battery power, thus maximizing energy utilization and reducing reliance on the grid.

Key Features

Packed with an array of features that make it a standout product in the market. Some of its key features include:

High Power Output: Offers a robust power output of 30 kilowatts, making it suitable for both residential and commercial applications.

Three-Phase Compatibility: Designed to cater to three-phase power systems, this inverter ensures smooth operation and balanced power distribution.

Hybrid Functionality: With its hybrid capabilities, the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter allows for efficient utilization of solar power, battery power, and grid power, optimizing energy consumption.

Multiple MPPT Inputs: This inverter supports multiple Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) inputs, enabling the connection of multiple solar arrays for increased energy harvesting.

Intelligent Energy Management: Equipped with advanced energy management algorithms, the DEYE 30Kw intelligently manages the flow of power, prioritizing renewable energy sources.

Monitoring and Control: The inverter provides comprehensive monitoring and control features, allowing users to track energy generation, consumption, and system performance in real-time.

Benefits of the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter

Investing in the DEYE 30Kw offers numerous advantages to solar power system owners. Some of the key benefits include:

Energy Independence: By integrating the DEYE 30Kw into a solar power system, users can reduce their reliance on the grid and achieve a greater level of energy independence.

Cost Savings: The intelligent energy management capabilities of this inverter result in significant cost savings by maximizing the utilization of free solar energy and minimizing grid electricity consumption.

Enhanced Efficiency: The DEYE 30Kw’s advanced technology ensures high conversion efficiency, allowing for the optimal utilization of solar energy and reducing energy wastage.

Seamless Integration: This inverter seamlessly integrates with existing solar power systems, making it a versatile solution for both new installations and retrofitting.

Environmental Impact: By harnessing solar energy effectively, the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter contributes to a greener planet by reducing carbon emissions and reliance on fossil fuels.

Installation and Setup

Installing the DEYE 30kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter is a straightforward process. However, it is best to consult a professional solar installer to properly install and configure the system, ensuring optimal performance and safety. Additionally, install the inverter in a well-ventilated area, providing adequate clearance and protection from the elements.

Performance and Efficiency

The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter is known for its exceptional performance and high efficiency. Its advanced technology and intelligent power management systems ensure maximum power output and seamless operation. The inverter’s high conversion efficiency helps in reducing energy losses and maximizing the return on investment for solar power system owners.

Safety and Reliability

Safety is of utmost importance when it comes to solar power installations. The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter adheres to stringent safety standards and incorporates various protection mechanisms to safeguard the system and its components. It features comprehensive protection against overvoltage, overcurrent, short circuits, and other electrical faults, ensuring a safe and reliable operation.

Maintenance and Warranty

The inverter comes with a standard warranty, thereby providing peace of mind to users in case of any manufacturing defects or malfunctions.

The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter seamlessly integrates with solar power systems of various sizes and configurations. Its compatibility with different types of solar panels and battery technologies makes it a versatile choice for residential and commercial applications. The inverter’s intelligent energy management ensures optimal utilization of solar energy, resulting in increased self-consumption and reduced dependency on the grid.

Conclusion

The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, offers a powerful and efficient solution for harnessing solar energy. With its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter provides numerous benefits to solar power system owners. It promotes energy independence, along with cost savings and environmental sustainability, while also ensuring high performance, safety, and reliability.
name: Deye 30kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-30K-SG01HP3-BM3)

short_description: The LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid inverter supports several working modes, including Pure off-grid working mode: working as traditional off-grid inverters, can prioritize between using AC power or solar power.
description:
The LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid inverter supports several working modes, including Pure off-grid working mode: working as traditional off-grid inverters, can prioritize between using AC power or solar power. Hybrid working mode: working as a hybrid, supporting solar and utility jointly taking the load can choose between self- consumption mode or change priority mode. With thousands of hybrid inverters & AC units installed around the world,
Luxpower has stepped even further to bring power to every home, with or without grid power.
LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid series off grid inverters can support the system to work as back-up power or a replacement for diesel generator. Since the inverter support paralleling function. The capacity of the system can range from 3kW to 50kW.

Reclaim Your Power

  • Off grid seamless switching
  • Wide PV input voltage range
  • Great battery compatibility
  • Single Phase / Unbalanced 3-Phase
  • Support up to 16pcs in parallel.
  • Separate generator port available
  • Intelligent off grid & hybrid modes
name: LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid Inverter

description:
Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Inverter Single Phase is new design of solar and battery inverter that you can use in on-grid solar, off-grid solar and back-up systems. The LXP Hybrid implements a programmable and scheduled intelligent solar storage system. This power inverter battery can help increase your solar energy self-use and protect your home appliances from grid shortages. Power battery inverter can also balance your energy use strategy to save on energy costs ## Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Description **Battery Parameters**
• Compatible Battery Type: Lead-acid / Lithium
• Nominal Battery Voltage: 48VDC
• Battery Voltage Range: 40VDC-60VDC
• Maximum Charge / Discharge Current: 250A
• Maximum Charge / Discharge Power: 12 000W **DC PV Input**
• Max DC Input for Single MPPT: 12 000W / 7 000W / 7 000W
• Maximum PV Input: 18 000W
• DC Input Voltage Range: 100VDC-600VDC
• Nominal DC Input Voltage: 360VDC
• Full Power MPPT Voltage Range: 230VDC-500VDC
• Maximum DC Input Current: 25A / 15A / 15A
• MPPT Number / Strings per MPPT: 3(2/1/1) **AC Output (Grid)**
• Nominal Power: 12 000W
• Nominal AC Voltage: 240VAC
• Operating Voltage Range: 180VAC-270VAC
• Maximum Continuous AC Current: 50A @ 240VAC
• Nominal AC Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz **UPS Output (With Battery)**
• UPS Max Output Power: 12 000W
• UPS Nominal Output Voltage: 240VAC
• UPS Nominal Output Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz
• UPS Nominal Output Current: 50A @ 240VAC
• Peak Power: 14Kw 10Min / 16Kw 5 Min / 20Kw 500ms
• Switching Time: <20ms **Environment Limit**
• Ingress Protection: IP65
• Operating Temperature Range: -25°C to +60°C
• Cooling: Fan
• Communication: RS485 / WIFI / CAN
name: Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Inverter Single Phase (LXP-LB12K)

name: Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter (SUN-16K-SG01LP1-EU)
description: Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter, is suitable for residential and light commercial use, maximizing self-consumption rate of solar energy and increasing your energy impendence.   During the day, the PV system generates electricity which will be provided to the loads initially. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery via SUN 12/14/16K-SG. Finally, the stored energy can be released when the loads require it. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure uninterrupted supply in the event of grid blackout.Smart Monitoring PlatformThanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter Single Phase come with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.

It’s ideal for home and business and scalable so that you can expand it as required.

User-friendly
LCD Touch screen and buttons, easy operation.
Compatible with lithium-ion battery and lead acid battery.
Web browser and mobile App monitoring supported.
Reliable
PV lighting protection, Anti-islanding protection, Leakage current protection etc.
Support store energy from DG when needed, ensure the system working within 7*24H.
IP65 protection degree, adapt to indoor and outdoor using.
Automatically switch from on-grid to off-grid mode within 5ms.
Zero exporting function, fast reaction within 200ms in zero export mode.
Smart
Programmable charging and discharging schedule.
Both wind turbines and solar panels can be connected as DC input power.
Max. 16 units can be paralleled for higher system power.
Retrofitting of existing solar system to energy storage system

description:
The Dyness 5kW Hybrid Inverter series is designed for residential hybrid systems.
The inverter can work with Dyness low-voltage lithium-ion battery DL5.0X/DL5.0C/ Powerbox Pro to maximize self-consumption and provide backup power if the grid fails and there is not enough PV power to cover load demand.

Description:

  • Generator connectivity with multiple input methods and automatic generator On/Off control.
  • Automatic UPS switching (<4ms)
  • Supportive peak shaving controls in both “self-use” and “generator” mode.
  • Up to 135A (5.0/6.0K) and 190A (8.0K) max charge/discharge current
  • 6 customizable charge/ discharge time settings
  • 10 second 200% surge power backup overload capacity.
  • Support 1ph and 3ph flexible connection with max 36kW (5.0/6.0K) and 48kW (8.0K) in parallel.

short_description: Harness the power of the sun day and night with the ground-breaking range of Hybrid & AC inverters from Fox ESS. Full of advanced features and compatible with our very own range of high-voltage batteries, the hybrid ranges from Fox ESS. It is a new class of Inverter.

Introducing the Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter – the perfect solution for commercial and industrial applications. This high-efficiency inverter can handle up to 65,000W of energy, so you’ll never be without power!
name: Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter (SUN-50K-SG01HP3)

images.alt: Deye 50kw Hybrid inverter 3 phase with smart monitoring

description:
Introducing the Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter – the perfect solution for commercial and industrial applications. This high-efficiency inverter can handle up to 65,000W of energy, so you’ll never be without power!
With remote monitoring capabilities through our dedicated Sunsynk Connect app, you can track the efficiency of your system on-the-go, helping you to stay ahead of potential issues to ensure optimal performance.

## Description
Designed for easy installation and maintenance, the Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter will\x20seamlessly integrate into your world to reduce costs, and provide reliable, renewable energy.
This power management tool allows the user to hit those ‘parity’ targets by managing power flow from multiple sources such as solar, mains power (grid)\x20and generators, and then effectively storing and releasing power as and when utilities require.
Battery Cable. Double Insulated Welding Cable, also known as DC Cable.

description:
The BSL Battery Canbus (51.2v 6.4kWh) is designed as a drop-in replacement for similar sized lead-acid batteries offering twice the run-time and nearly half the weight. The 51.2V series is designed for lower voltage, lower power and longer run-time applications. They are built with LFP Technology that offers outstanding intrinsic safety and excellent float and cycle life resulting in low cost of ownership.

## BSL Battery Canbus (51.2v 6.4kWh) Features

* Eco-friendly
* Lithium iron phosphate battery (LiFePO4)
* Currently the safest lithium technology
* Excellent resistance to abuse
* Less than 3% self-discharging
* Maintenance-free, modular, and lightweight
* Up to 60% weight saving.
* Battery monitoring storage history
* Built in safety protection.
* Quality guaranteed.
* 10 Years Warranty
* 15 – 18 Years Designed service life

Deye Lithium Battery
  • Safer – Cobalt Free Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) Battery, safety and long lifespan and high-energy density. Low Voltage safety connection.
  • High Performance – Maximum support 1C charge and 1.2C discharge. Maximum 6000 cycles at 90% DOD, and 10 years standard warranty.
  • Reliable – Built-in Intelligent BMS, providing complete protection. Natural cooling IP20 wide temperature range: -20 degrees to 55 degrees.
  • Flexible – Modular design easy to expand. Max 32 units in parallel. Max capacity of 340kWh. Suited to residential and commercial applications for increasing the self-consumption ratio.
  • Convenient – Battery module auto networking (No DIP switch code), easy maintenance, support Deye remotely monitoring and upgrade.
  • Eco Friendly – Use environmental protection materials, the whole module non toxic, pollution – free.
  • Two Mounting Methods – Flat design, Wall mounted with Wall Brackets, Floor Stand with removable base, saving installation space.
short_description: – Lithium iron phosphate battery developed and produced by Deye.– Provides reliable power for various types of equipment and systems.– Ideal for high power, limited installation space, restricted load-bearing, and long cycle life applications.– Built-in BMS (Battery Management System) manages and monitors voltage, current, and temperature.– BMS balances cell charging to extend cycle life.– Multiple batteries can connect in parallel for increased capacity and longer power support.– Features a modular design for easy expansion as energy storage needs grow.– Additional battery modules can be added without overhauling the system.– Flexible design suitable for both residential and commercial applications.– Cost-effective way to scale energy storage as power demands change.

Battery Chemistry: LiFePO4Battery Module Capacity (Ah): 100AhSystem Nominal Voltage (V): 51.2Charge/Discharging Current (A): Recommend: 50, Max: 180, Peak (10S, 25℃): 270Recommended Depth of Discharge (%): 90%1c 10 year Manufacturers WarrantyBase and Power Distribution Unit ( PDU) sold separately.The picture illustrates several battery stacked on the base with the PDU See datasheet for more information.[1] DC Usable Energy, test conditions: 90% DOD, 0.5C charge & discharge at 25°C. System usable energy may vary due to system configuration parameters.[2] The current is affected by temperature and SOC.[3] The warranty is due whichever reached first of warranty period or energy throughput.
name: DEYE LV Battery AI-W5.1  (51.2V 100AH 5.12kWh)
description: DEYE LV Battery AI-W5.1  DescriptionDEYE LV Battery AI-W5.1 uses lithium iron phosphate battery pack that provides a safe, reliable energy storage solution for residential and commercial applications requiring power in tight spaces or under load restrictions. An intelligent battery management system (BMS) monitors critical cell data points like voltage, current and temperature, balancing charging and discharging to maximize the battery’s lifespan. Modular and flexible, batteries easily expand capacity up to 184kWh by combining clusters of 36 units. Installation is simplified through a stackable, floor-mounted design without extra wiring or fasteners.  The battery comes with intelligent remote monitoring for easy maintenance and firmware upgrades.SaferCobalt Free Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) Battery, safety and long lifespan, high efficiency and high power density. Intelligent BMS, providing complete protection.ReliableSupport high discharge power. IP55, natural cooling, wide temperature range: -20℃ to 55℃.FlexibleModular design, easy to expand, Max. 6 clusters in parallel(36 pcs), Max. capacity of 184kWh.Suited to residential and commercial applications for increasing the self consumption ratio.ConvenientBattery module auto networking, automatic IP addressing, easy maintenance, remotely monitoring and upgrade the firmware.Eco-FriendlyUse environmental protection materials, the whole module non-toxic, pollution-free.Quick InstallationFlat and stackable design, floor-mounted, no wiring and extra fixing screws, rapid and easy installation. 0/5 (0 Reviews)

description:
The Dyness Powerbox Pro is a type of deep cycle and high capacity LFP battery with improved safety, long lifespan and optimized user experience. It is especially designed with IP65 for more flexible and easier installation indoor or outdoor with wall-mounted and landed installation options. With up to 10 kWh for a single unit and max 5 units in parallel with superior performance, it can meet the household electricity demand.

## Battery Charge / Discharge Current

* 100A Recommended ( 5.12kW)
* 150A Maximum (7.68kW)
* Peak Power Charge / Discharge Current : 200A(15s)

## Environment Limit

* Charge Condition: 0°C to 55°
* Discharge Condition: -20°C to 55°C
* Relative Humidity: 5% to 85% (Non Condensing)
* Enclosure Protection: IP20

## Alarms

* Overcharge/Overdischarge/Overcurrent/Overtemperature/Short circuit

## Monitoring & Protection

* Each system has a smart Battery Management System (BMS), and breaker embedded in system

## Pros

* Can be used in both Off-Grid and Hybrid setups, compact design, modular expansion

## Compatible Inverters

* Victron, SMA, Goodwe, Lmeon, Solis, SAJ, Growatt, Luxpower, Voltronic, Deye etc.

## Certification Standards

* CE/UN38.3/IEC62040 undergoing

Lux SNA5000 5kw Full Package includes.

## Lux SNA5000 5kw Full Package Description

## Inverter 

* 1 x Lux SNA5000 Inverter (5kW) – 3 Year Warranty

## Battery 

* 1 x HINA ESS Hi-5 Lithium Battery ( 51.2V 100AH 5.12KWH) – 10 Year Warranty

## Solar Panels

* 6 x 460w Solar Panels (Stock dependent)

## Accessories 

* 50m x 6mm Solar Cable – Red
* 50m x 6mm Solar Cable – Black
* 1 x 1 String PV Combiner Box IP65 (Unwired)
* 1 x 5kw AC Changeover Combiner Box IP65 (Unwired)
* 1 x Onesto 3 Pole Battery Disconnect (160A) and fuses
* 4 x MC4 Connectors
* 20m Surfix Cable 6mm
* Trunking 100mm x 40mm
* Other smalls included (You can contact the office to ask for an itemized list if needed)

Includes mounting structure for Tile/IBR/Corrugated Roof Types (Excludes Angled mounting)

**WHEN COMPLETING THE ORDER, PLEASE NOTE WHICH ROOF TYPE YOU HAVE TO ENSURE THE CORRECT MOUNTING STRUCTURE IS GIVEN**

Installation to be done by a qualified electrician. For more info see our warranty information page Here

description:
The LFP BSL Battery Canbus (51.2v 7kWh) Energy Storage Systems are a family of 51.2V battery modules and accessories. The 51.2V family is designed as a drop-in replacement for similar sized lead-acid batteries offering twice the run-time and nearly half the weight. The 51.2V series is designed for lower voltage, lower power and longer run-time applications. They are built with LFP Technology that offers outstanding intrinsic safety and excellent float and cycle life resulting in low cost of ownership.

BSL BATTERY CANBUS (51.2v 7kWh) Features

Eco-friendly

Lithium iron phosphate battery (LiFePO4)

Currently the safest lithium technology

Excellent resistance to abuse

Less than 3% self-discharging

Maintenance-free, modular, and lightweight

Up to 60% weight saving.

Battery monitoring storage history

Built in safety protection.

Quality guaranteed.

10 Years Warranty

15-18 Years Designed service life.

150A DC breaker–on/off switch
short_description: BSLBATT® batteries are based on Lithium iron battery technology (LiFePO4). This is the safest Lithium technology available today. On top of that our bespoke casing and electronics further increase safety and durability.

description:
Household energy storage system Sunwoda Atrix-5 (51.2v 5.12kWh) is a green, efficient, advanced, and safe energy supply system that can reduce your electricity bill by storing excess clean energy generated by the solar panel, or energy from the grid during off-peak hours. 

It is mainly used for residential self-generation, peak shaving and valley filling, emergency power backup, and power optimization in residential and commercial buildings. The Atrix series can be expanded from 5kWh to 40kWh, allowing homeowners to build their own energy storage system flexibly.

## Sunwoda Atrix-5 (51.2v 5.12kWh) Description 

### Flexible application

* Modular and cabinet installation

### Easy to install

* With a modular, lightweight, and plug-and-play design, the Atrix series only takes 1-2 people to install

### Excellent Performance at Low Temperature

* The Atrix series can be 100% DOD and can operate at -10℃ without any limitation or attenuation

### Real-Time Monitoring

* Homeowners can control and monitor their Atrix series via APP anytime and anywhere

• 100% DOD

• 10 Years Warranty – see warranty document under important documents

description:
SRNE All-In-One 3.5kw (3.5kw 5.12kWh 24V) (SREOV2435) is an all in one package that makes solar energy storage and distribution quick and easy to install.

## SRNE All-In-One 3.5kw (3.5kw 5.12kWh 24V) (SREOV2435)

### Easy to upscale

*   Up to 4 batteries in parallel expand to 20.48kWh
*   Up to 2 systems in parallel with double storage & output

### Easy to install

*   No matching and commissioning required, ready to install
*   Plug-and-play, eliminate the clutter of wires

### User friendly

*   Get started quickly and use it instantly
*   Min. width of just 13cm, saving space in the home

### Intelligence

*   Time-slot function to save on electricity costs
*   Large LCD screen with real-time data

### Safety

*   High quality lithium iron phosphate cells
*   Proven Li-ion battery management solutions

### Designed for families

*   Support Off-grid/Hybrid/On-Grid output
*   Multiple charge and discharge modes available
